data.meta_description: Learn about Emmanuel Xuereb on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Emmanuel Xuereb, such as Bad Boys.
data.text: Throughout his entertainment career as an accomplished actor, Emmanuel Xuereb graced the silver screen many times. Xuereb's career began by acting in comedies like "The Bonfire of the Vanities" (1990) and "The Cowboy Way" (1994) with Woody Harrelson. He worked in television in his early acting career as well, including parts on "Law & Order" (NBC, 1990-2010) and "New York Undercover" (Fox, 1994-98). His film career continued throughout the nineties and the early 2000s in productions like "Bad Boys" (1995), "Grim" (1996) and "Jerks" (2000). He also played parts in television during these years, including roles in "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" (1996-2003) and "The Division" (Lifetime, 2000-04). He also was featured in the TV movie "Fathers and Sons" (Showtime, 2004). Most recently, Xuereb acted in the crime thriller "Dark Reel" (2009) with Tiffany Shepis. Xuereb was married to Stacey Dash.
